content: knitted shawl in drops air the piece is worked sideways with garter stitch cables and i-cord drops design pattern ai-509 yarn group c or a + a **size** height in middle = approx 30 cm width from side to side = approx 164 cm **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150 g colour 33 pink sand **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm 17 stitches in width and 33 row in height with garter stitch on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm
